languages.text: "Арбитры тотчас отправятся за приговоренным. Всем присутствующим предписывается ожидать свершения правосудия".

traits.locale_text: "Арбитры тотчас отправятся за приговоренным. Заседание вынужденно уходит на перерыв до свершения правосудия".

languages.text: "Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."
languages.original_text: "Арбитры тотчас отправятся за приговоренным. Всем присутствующим предписывается ожидать свершения правосудия".

traits.locale_text: "Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."
"The Rogue Trader has passed {mf|him|her} verdict! Master Anjelio is sentenced to death for questioning the righteousness of the Emperor's servants, the Doleful Host!"
"Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."
"Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."
"Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."
"Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."
"Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."
"Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. The court is forced to take a recess until justice can be served."
"Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. The court is forced to take a recess until justice can be served."
"Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."

languages.text: "Arbitratoren werden entsandt, um den verurteilten Verbrecher umgehend herzubringen. Alle Anwesenden müssen warten, bis der Gerechtigkeit Genüge getan werden kann."
languages.original_text: "Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."

traits.locale_text: "Arbitratoren werden entsandt, um den verurteilten Verbrecher umgehend herzubringen. Alle Anwesenden müssen warten, bis der Gerechtigkeit Genüge getan werden kann."
"Arbitratoren werden entsandt, um den verurteilten Verbrecher umgehend herzubringen. Das Gericht muss sich vertagen, bis der Gerechtigkeit Genüge getan werden kann."

languages.text: « Nous allons immédiatement envoyer des arbitrators se saisir du condamné. Toutes les personnes présentes sont sommées d'attendre jusqu'à ce que justice soit rendue. »
languages.original_text: "Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons immédiatement envoyer des arbitrators se saisir du condamné. Toutes les personnes présentes sont sommées d'attendre jusqu'à ce que justice soit rendue. »
« Nous allons immédiatement envoyer des arbitrators se saisir du condamné. La cour est donc contrainte de suspendre l'audience jusqu'à ce que justice puisse être rendue. »

languages.text: “我们会立刻派遣法务官将罪犯押送至此。全体人员请暂时等待，直到正义得到伸张为止。”
languages.original_text: "Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."

traits.locale_text: “我们会立刻派遣法务官将罪犯押送至此。全体人员请暂时等待，直到正义得到伸张为止。”
“行商浪人已经做出了判决！安杰里奥大师怀疑帝皇的忠仆，质疑阴沉之主的正义，在此判处死刑！”
“我们会立刻派遣法务官将罪犯押送至此。法庭暂时休庭，直到正义得到伸张为止。”
“我们会立刻派遣法务官将罪犯押送至此。法庭暂时休庭，直到正义得到伸张为止。”

languages.text: «Que los Arbitrator traigan al criminal condenado de inmediato. El tribunal deberá descansar hasta que se pueda hacer justicia».
languages.original_text: "Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."

traits.locale_text: «Que los Arbitrator traigan al criminal condenado de inmediato. El tribunal deberá descansar hasta que se pueda hacer justicia».

languages.text: 「アービトレイターは直ちに赴き、死刑囚の身柄を確保してください。ここにいる者は全員、刑が執行されるまで待機してください」
languages.original_text: "Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターは直ちに赴き、死刑囚の身柄を確保してください。ここにいる者は全員、刑が執行されるまで待機してください」
「ローグトレーダーは{mf|彼|彼女}の判決を下された！皇帝のしもべであるドールフル・ホストの正義を疑った罪で、ここにマスター・アンヘリオの死刑を宣告する！」

languages.text: "Yargıcılar, mahkûm edilen suçluyu getirmek üzere derhâl gönderilecek. Mahkeme salonunda bulunanlar, adalet yerini bulana dek bekleyecektir."
languages.original_text: "Arbitrators will be dispatched to retrieve the condemned criminal at once. All those present are to wait until justice is served."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcılar, mahkûm edilen suçluyu getirmek üzere derhâl gönderilecek. Mahkeme salonunda bulunanlar, adalet yerini bulana dek bekleyecektir."
"Yargıcılar, mahkûm edilen suçluyu getirmek üzere derhâl gönderilecek. Mahkeme, adalet yerini bulana dek ara vermek zorunda kalmıştır."
